title: Tiling walls
brief_description: Demonstrates using a jury stick to compare alternative layouts, application of moisture membrane for a waterproof substrate, mixing mortar and floating a vertical bed, and cutting and shaping tiles. This program is a companion to “Setting Ceramic Tile” (The Taunton Press, 1987) and page references appear in the corners of the screen.
